ygData.subject: RE: Bard workaround to binding in evil cities- will thi s work?
ygData.msgSnippet: Good point John on the second one :-) A question though.  Since your post below was in response to my post asking if the evil city binding technique I
ygData.messageBody:
Good point John on the second one :-)

A question though. Since your post below was in response to my post asking
if the evil city binding technique I described would work, do you have an
opinion on it?

Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [SMTP:kim@...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 11:37 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard workaround to binding in evil cities-
> will thi s work?
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> Another interesting twist on this debate:
>
> Bards: Give us bind.
> Verant: You are a melee class, you will not get bind.
>
> Bards: Raise our Dodge cap, or give us Parry.
> Verant: You are not a true melee class, your defensive combat
> skills will only be slightly better than priests.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
>
